name: 2021 4th International Conference on Artificial Intelligence and Pattern Recognition
content: Publicationï¼š All accepted papers after proper registration and presentation will be published in International Conference Proceedings Series by ACM (ISBN: 978-1-4503-8408-7), which will be indexed by Ei Compendex and Scopus and submitted to be reviewed by Thomson Reuters Conference Proceedings Citation Index (ISI Web of Science).
